articles.author: Nathan Reiff
articles.description: While centralized exchanges expose customers to security risk in the event that they collapse, and to unpredictable liquidity, inflexible staking rules, and more, YieldFlow aims for a smooth user experience governed by trust, security, and decentralization.
articles.title: How to Use Yieldflow: the DeFi Protocol for Passive Growth of Digital Assets

articles.author: Matt Hussey
articles.description: TON uses a sharded, proof of stake consensus mechanism, meaning it can process transactions in parallel, improving transaction speed.

articles.description: Bernard Arnault is preparing to choose which child will inherit his $400 billion luxury empire. The decision could have major implications for crypto.
articles.title: Arnault Family LVMH Succession Saga: Will Pro-Crypto Sons Prevail?

articles.author: Joseph O'Neill

articles.description: In 250 pages of leaked writings about the collapse of FTX, its co-founder Sam Bankman-Fried laments that he feels "broke" and "hated."

articles.description: MetaMask is a leading crypto wallet, and relies on browser integration and good design to serve as one of the main gateways to the world of Web3, decentralized finance (DeFi) and NFTs. Here's how it works, and how to get started with it. What Is MetaMask? MetaMask is a browser extension and mobile app that […]

articles.title: INTERVIEW: How Will Aurory Use NFTs and Crypto?

articles.description: Google's Global Head of Google Cloud for Web3 James Tromans sat down with Decrypt's Jason Nelson to discuss how AI can help Web3 companies come to market faster and the real value of Web3 tools.
articles.title: Google Cloud's James Tromans on the Intersection of AI and Web3

articles.description: Take Degen U's new course, Mastering NFT Trading, and earn an on-chain certificate. A top instructor will help you identify trends, seize the right moment to trade, weed out scams—and have fun while doing it!
articles.title: Mastering NFT Trading - Degen U

articles.description: Jerome Wu, CEO of Space Nation, tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the upcoming Space Nation Online game in development and shares details on Space Nation Cofounder Roland Emmerich's role in the project.
articles.title: Space Nation CEO on Working With 'Independence Day' Director Roland Emmerich

articles.description: Champions Arena is a turn-based fantasy RPG from Gala Games, where characters can become NFTs and crypto can be used to purchase gems, one of the game's synthetic currencies. Decrypt's Kate Irwin takes us inside the game for her thoughts on the fun, mobile-first title.
articles.title: GAME REVIEW: Champions Arena from Gala Games

articles.description: Voice actor Ben Prendergast, who's voiced characters in games like Apex Legends and God of War Ragnarok, shares his opinions on the tech space's history of "bubbles" and whether blockchain gaming has a future.
articles.title: Apex Legends Voice Actor Ben Prendergast on the Future of Gaming

articles.description: In this interview, SingularityNET COO Janet Adams explains the intricate details that went into creating the Desdemona robot AI from Hanson Robotics and future plans for the AI Diva.
articles.title: The Future of AI Stardom and Robotics With SingularityNET COO Janet Adams and Desdemona

articles.description: Mino Games CEO Sasha MacKinnon, developer of the upcoming Dimensionals game, tells Decrypt's Kate Irwin about the studio's approach to digital collectibles.
articles.title: Crypto a 'No-Brainer' for Video Games, Says Mino Games CEO

articles.description: At Solana's PlayGG, Star Atlas CEO Michael Wagner shares his "controversial take" on crypto in games, shares the challenges of developing the upcoming scifi game, and how crypto's volatility has changed his perspective with Decrypt's Jason Nelson.
articles.title: Michael Wagner's 'Controversial Take' on Crypto in Games

articles.description: Angelic is a sci-fi roleplay game in development that will be free-to-play and offer optional, opt-in crypto features on Solana and Ethereum and a governance token. Metaverse Game Studios CEO and Founder Erkan Bayol tells Decrypt's Jason Nelson about how he sees AAA traditional games as Angelic's main competitors and shares his vision for the game.
articles.title: Interview: Angelic CEO on Building the Sci-Fi RPG on Solana and Ethereum
